data.market_trends: Growing trend toward experiential travel and eco-tourism, with an emphasis on sustainability.
data.consumer_behavior: Travelers increasingly looking for personalized travel packages that cater to unique interests like photography and nature tours.
data.competitive_landscape: Iceland is positioning itself strongly due to its accessibility and unique offerings compared to other cold-weather destinations.
data.seasonal_factors: Winter provides unique activities such as snowmobiling and ice fishing that are popular among adventure seekers.
